venue.name: Emerson Umbrella Center for the Arts

item.description:
**** Register now*****

Figure and Portrait Classes with Joy Buell

Expression using the figure is the focus of this class. We will explore art history and anatomy as well as composition. The model will be used in a variety of poses; shorter nude poses, a long pose and a clothed portrait. Near the end of the course there will be an exciting exercise utilizing all the shorter poses in one major artwork! Media recommended for this class are pastel, charcoal, pencil, or acrylic paint. This class is open to those who are serious about being creative with the figure.

8 weeks beginning April 24th; Wednesday, 1:30 â€“ 4:30 pm

Cost: $440 (includes model fee)

To register and for more information visit the EU website: http://www.emersonumbrella.org/classes/2013-spring-summer-adult-classes/#draw
item.name: Figure and Portrait Drawing at Emerson Umbrella Center for the Arts
